nodes.text: Ukatis was the ruling planet of the Ukatis system of the Inner Rim.

Around the year 4015 BBY, the Ukatis system was interdicted by its own King. The King kept his people starving, poor and isolated from the rest of the galaxy in order to more easily oppress them. The Galactic Senate attempted to negotiate a settlement to the crisis, but was stonewalled and rendered unable to act.

A number of individuals, including Jedi Padawan Jolee Bindo, had other plans however, and decided run the blockade to deliver food and water to the Ukatis system without waiting for the Republic to take action. Eventually, the blockade on the Ukatis system was broken.
